channel.title: How do you delete the text in your client
channel.description: I don't think the title has explained it well but when you run the client and you have logged on, in the bottom left it says "your client" (I have changed to my server) So i want to delete that bit of text. So it now says "FusionScape" - thats the part i want deleted. Thank You. Picture - [img]http://imageshack.us/m/716/1246/evolved0013.png[/img]

item.title: How do you delete the text in your client
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:395086”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=492275.msg3599747#msg3599747 date=1305449794]

Most likely it’s in your client.java, unless this is a renamed client.

Did the IQ of MoparScape drop sharply overnight?

Isn’t there a noose in your closet waiting for you?
[/quote]

No. Why would I have a noose in my closet? It doesn’t belong there.

And the responses here other than mine claimed that there needed to be some client-side modifications. Where if you had actually looked at his question, and with a little bit of common sense, you could have easily deduced that it was handled server-side.[/quote]
There’s a client.java in server files as well.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you delete the text in your client

item.title: How do you delete the text in your client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:8, topic:395086”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=492275.msg3599731#msg3599731 date=1305447645]

Most likely it’s in your client.java, unless this is a renamed client.

Did the IQ of MoparScape drop sharply overnight?
[/quote]
Isn’t there a noose in your closet waiting for you?[/quote]

No. Why would I have a noose in my closet? It doesn’t belong there.

And the responses here other than mine claimed that there needed to be some client-side modifications. Where if you had actually looked at his question, and with a little bit of common sense, you could have easily deduced that it was handled server-side.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you delete the text in your client

item.title: How do you delete the text in your client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Bumm85:

Just change it to a blank text.

That would be useless, as it would be an erroneous packet being sent for no reason.

item.title: How do you delete the text in your client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Search for “FusionScape” in all your source files. Then you can either remove the method call, or change it to your server name. However most people find things like that annoying.

Read full topic
